thread.section_title: Wheelbasealloys Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wheelbasealloys | www.wheelbasealloys.com | 3 of 33
thread.title: Mary Pearse

author: Mary Pearse
title: Mary Pearse
text:
I needed to equip my car with winter tyres for a trip to Germany.
The guys at Wheelbase were really helpful in giving advice as to what wheels would be suitable for my car.
I wanted 5 wheels so that I would have a spare (i know, I'm old-fashioned!); the 'deals' on the website were for 4 wheels, but a quick phone call was all it took to order 5.
Wheelbase told me that the particular wheels I wanted were in Germany; they would come in to Wheelbase, who would send them on to me - tracked delivery.
The whole process was really easy, and the helpful advice came via e-mail and on the phone.
REAL customer service!
